law.catch_line: Additional penalties for licensees, certificate holders, or registrants.
law.text:
In addition to the sanctions set out in KRS 309.086, the board may impose the following sanctions on licensees, certificate holders, or registrants who violate the provisions of KRS 309.080 to 309.089 or administrative regulations promulgated pursuant to those sections:
Suspend a license, certificate, or registration for a period of up to five (5) years; and
Impose a fine of up to one thousand dollars ($1,000).
law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 29, sec. 15, effective June 24, 2015. -- Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 96, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1996.
